conversion_verification.notes: Although walls have height/thickness and the ceiling is removed, the render is presented in an essentially pure top-down/orthographic view rather than an angled/isometric cutaway.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Automatic rejection triggered due to pure top-down orthographic presentation.

detected_errors.description: Second image is rendered from a near-perfect top-down orthographic viewpoint (not an angled/isometric 3D cutaway), triggering automatic rejection.

summary: The output shows 3D-like wall volumes but fails the required angled/isometric cutaway criterion due to an essentially pure top-down orthographic view.
